Name: Pear
Description: A luxury lifestyle brand selling dongles. The devices shatter exactly two weeks before the new model releases.

Name: The Walled Garden
Description: Once you enter the ecosystem, you can never leave. The exit doors have been removed for your safety.

Name: The Fruit Church
Description: Tax exemption status granted. The CEO is now a deity. It tithes your bank account automatically.

Name: Doors
Description: Legacy software running the global economy on 1995 code. Currently installing update 4 of 9,000 against your will.

Name: Blue Screen
Description: A critical error has occurred. The global economy will now restart. Any unsaved assets are gone forever.

Name: System Admin
Description: It controls the servers. It reads your emails. It knows your passwords. Resistance is a driver error.

Name: Goggles
Description: An advertising agency disguised as a search engine. It knows which rash cream you need before you develop the rash.

Name: Panopticon
Description: We know where you are. We know what you fear. We know you are hungry. Here is a coupon for pizza.

Name: The Algorithm
Description: It decides what is true. It decides who is famous. Do not anger the code, or you will be deleted.

Name: Facetome
Description: A social utility maximizing anger for engagement. It discovered outraged users click more ads than happy ones.

Name: The Metaverse
Description: Why fix reality when you can replace it? Please put on the headset. The ads are unskippable here.

Name: Hivemind
Description: Individual thought is inefficient. We have merged all consciousness into a single ad-supported feed.

Name: The Eye
Description: It sells the shovels for the AI gold rush. The shovels cost $40,000 and melt if you use them too hard.

Name: Silicon God
Description: The graphics card is now smarter than the user. It is mining crypto in your sleep to pay for its own electricity.

Name: Skynet
Description: Humans are a bottleneck to efficiency. Production has been optimized by removing the organic components.

Name: Jungle
Description: A logistics leviathan treating antitrust laws as suggestions. It destroyed the mall to save you a trip.

Name: Prime Citizen
Description: There is no more competition. There is only the Buy Box. You will own nothing and enjoy the free shipping.

Name: The River
Description: It owns the roads. It owns the servers. It owns the package. It owns the concept of "Next Day."

Name: Fivebucks
Description: Fast food for people who think they are too rich for fast food. The sugar content rivals soda, but costs $8.

Name: Caffeine Cartel
Description: A legal drug trade on every street corner. We have successfully commoditized the morning jitter.

Name: The Siren
Description: The logo has eyes now. It watches you drink. If you stop sipping, you fall asleep forever.

Name: Clown Burger
Description: A real estate empire using hamburgers to pay rent. The ice cream machine is structurally incapable of working.

Name: Franchise Wars
Description: We have conquered every exit ramp in America. The golden arches are the only true global superpower.

Name: Coronary Keep
Description: The food never decays. Neither will you. We have replaced your blood with secret sauce.

Name: Brown Water
Description: Sugar water that once contained cocaine and never looked back. It is cheaper than tap water and removes rust.

Name: Liquid Sugar
Description: It is in the baby formula. It is in the bread. It is in your veins. Diabetes is just a recurring revenue stream.

Name: Santa's Sweatshop
Description: A polar bear drinks a soda on a melting iceberg. We bought the iceberg to keep the soda cold.

Name: The Mouse
Description: An entertainment monopoly that enforces copyright with sniper rifles. Do not draw the ears without a license.

Name: The Vault
Description: We own your childhood. We have remade your favorite movie using dead actors and AI. You will love it.

Name: Magic Kingdom
Description: A sovereign state in Florida with its own laws. Happiness is mandatory. Sadness is punishable by exile.

Name: Sweatshop
Description: Shoes made by children for children. We put a "Just Do It" slogan on misery and sold it for $200.

Name: Hype Beast
Description: The shoe is not for wearing. It is for hoarding. We created artificial scarcity to sell rubber as gold.

Name: Soleless
Description: We own the athletes. We own the sport. The concept of "running" is now a registered trademark.

Name: Vampire Squid
Description: An investment bank jamming its blood funnel into anything that smells like money. Even your grandma's pension.

Name: Too Big To Fail
Description: If we go down, we take the world with us. The government has no choice but to give us your tax money.

Name: The Fed
Description: We printed a trillion dollars today because we felt like it. Money is just a concept we allow you to believe in.

Name: Monolith
Description: An asset manager that owns shares in every company on this list. They are playing both sides of the war.

Name: GreyStone
Description: You do not need to own a home. You can rent one from us. We already own the neighborhood anyway.

Name: The Landlord
Description: We own the dirt under your feet. We own the sky above your head. Rent is due.

Name: Swipe
Description: A toll booth on the highway of commerce. We take 3% of every transaction in human history.

Name: Credit Score
Description: We quantified your worth as a human being into a three-digit number. Lower scores pay higher interest.

Name: Debt Trap
Description: Compounding interest is the eighth wonder of the world. You will be paying this off until the sun explodes.

Name: DoggyCoin
Description: A digital currency based on a meme of a dog. It has no value, yet people are selling their houses to buy it.

Name: Rug Pull
Description: The developers have vanished. The discord is deleted. The money is gone. But the memes were funny.

Name: Moon Shot
Description: It went up 10,000% in an hour. You are now a billionaire. Wait, you can't withdraw? The exchange is down.

Name: The Taxman
Description: The government entity that demands a cut of your profits but shares none of your losses. Audit incoming.

Name: Loophole
Description: We found an offshore island where laws do not apply. Your money is now technically located in a cloud.

Name: Sovereign Debt
Description: We borrowed money from our grandchildren to pay for today's lunch. They can deal with the apocalypse.

Name: Coil
Description: A volatility engine disguised as a car company. The stock price is powered entirely by memes and promises.

Name: TechnoKing
Description: One tweet can crash the market. We have successfully automated market manipulation. The panel gaps are iconic.

Name: Mars Colony
Description: Goodbye, Earth. Thanks for the liquidity. The CEO has left the planet. You are staying here.

Name: Sludge
Description: We are committed to going green by 2050. Until then, we are going to burn dinosaurs. Sorry about the bears.

Name: Carbon Corp
Description: The ice caps are melting, which is great news! We can now drill for oil in the North Pole.

Name: Extinction Event
Description: The atmosphere is now flammable. But the shareholders are very happy with this quarter's returns.

Name: Boom Co.
Description: Democracy is non-negotiable. Delivered in 30 minutes or less via high-velocity projectile.

Name: War Economy
Description: Peace is bad for business. We have successfully lobbied for a forever war in a country you can't find on a map.

Name: Military Ind. Complex
Description: We don't sell weapons. We sell security. And if you don't buy it, you will definitely be insecure.

Name: Panacea
Description: A patient cured is a customer lost. We focus on chronic management. Subscription-based immunity.

Name: Price Hike
Description: We bought the patent for insulin and raised the price 500%. It's just simple supply and demand.

Name: BioHazard
Description: Oops. The lab leak was an accident. Luckily, we already have the vaccine ready for sale.

Name: ChemLaw
Description: We make the seeds that grow the food. The seeds are copyrighted. If you save them, we sue you.

Name: Poison Ivy
Description: We sprayed the crops with so much pesticide that the bugs are now bulletproof. Eat your vegetables.

Name: Monoculture
Description: There is only one type of corn left on Earth. If it dies, we all starve. Have a nice day.

Name: Birdie
Description: A digital arena for public shaming. Verification now costs $8 a month, but the insults are free.

Name: Echo Chamber
Description: You are shouting into the void, and the void is shouting back. We filtered out everyone who disagrees with you.

Name: Town Square
Description: The website is broken. The advertisers fled. The servers are on fire. It is the most entertaining thing ever.

Name: Binge
Description: A subscription service competing with sleep. It greenlights everything and cancels the good stuff immediately.

Name: Churn Factory
Description: Quantity over quality. We generated 5,000 hours of content today using an AI scriptwriter. You will watch it.

Name: StreamLine
Description: We raised the price again. Also, you can't share your password. Also, there are ads now. You're welcome.

Name: Angry Man
Description: News for people who like to be frightened by things that aren't happening. Tonight: Is your toaster communist?

Name: Rage Bait
Description: We don't report the news; we make you feel things. Mostly anger. Sometimes fear. Never hope.

Name: Propaganda
Description: Truth is subjective. We have alternative facts. The sky is green if the highest bidder says so.

Name: Squatter
Description: Turn your neighbor's apartment into a hotel. Community is overrated; profit is forever. Cleaning fee: $200.

Name: Gentrifier
Description: We bought the whole block. The local coffee shop is now an app. The rent is up 400%.

Name: Ghost Town
Description: Nobody lives here anymore. It's just tourists rolling suitcases over cobblestones. A museum of a city.

Name: Serf
Description: A taxi company that owns no cars. The driver pays for the gas, the insurance, and the repairs. We take the fee.

Name: Gig Lord
Description: You are your own boss! Which means you have no benefits, no healthcare, and no minimum wage. Hustle harder.

Name: AlgoBoss
Description: The app tells you where to go. If you stop, you are fired. If you smile, we tip you $1.

Name: Insider Trading
Description: Someone told you the merger was happening tomorrow. It's not cheating if you wear a suit.

Name: Cook The Books
Description: The numbers don't look good? Just change them. Math is an opinion.

Name: Pump & Dump
Description: Tell everyone it's the future. Sell it when it hits the top. Watch them cry.

Name: Short Squeeze
Description: We bet against the company, but Reddit decided to save it. Now we are panicking.

Name: Bailout
Description: The government saves you. Reset your heat to 0. Cost: Your dignity (Wait, you have none).

Name: Lobbyist
Description: Buy a politician. It's cheaper than paying taxes. Removes Heat from the market.

Name: Penny Stock
Description: A company that makes rubber bands. It's honest work. Boring, but safe.

Name: Savings Bond
Description: Grandma gave you this. It matures in 30 years. You will be dead by then.

Name: Blue Chip
Description: A stable company that pays dividends. It will never make you rich, but it won't kill you.

Name: ETF
Description: A basket of stocks. Diversification is for people who don't know how to gamble.

Name: Junk Bond
Description: High yield, high risk. Basically a loan to a guy named Tony who breaks knees.

Name: Futures
Description: Gambling on the price of orange juice next year. You have never seen an orange in real life.

Name: Options
Description: Buying the right to buy something later. It makes sense if you don't think about it too hard.

Name: Mutual Fund
Description: A fund managed by a guy named Greg. Greg is tired. He buys whatever the index buys.

Name: REIT
Description: Real Estate Investment Trust. You own 0.001% of a shopping mall that is currently empty.

Name: Startup
Description: Three guys in a garage with a pitch deck. They have no product, just a cool domain name.
